  class Database {
    db_name : str
    tables : list[Table]
    add_table(table: Table)

    drop_table(table_name: str)
    get_table(table_name: str)
    load(file_path: str)
    save(file_path: str)

  class Char {
    value : str
    to_json_value()
    validate() bool

  class DataType {

    value : int

    validate() bool

    to_json_value()

    validate() bool

    value : str
    to_json_value()
    validate() bool
  }
  class Schema {
    fields : dict[str, DataType]
    validate(row: dict)
  }
  class Table {
    name : str
    rows : list[dict]
    schema
    delete(condition: dict)
    insert(row: dict)
    rename(new_name: str)
    select(columns: list[str], filter: dict)
    union(other: 'Table')
    update(condition: dict, new_values: dict)
    validate(row: dict)
  }
